title: Night Flight - Novel Updates
tags: Cold Love Interests   Modern Day   Murders   Short Story   Younger Love Interests
author: Kuga Arika   久我有加
description: After his best friend runs off with his fiancee, Seiichi heads for a town where UFOs have been spotted, hoping to escape from reality. Along the way, he meets a young man named Natori who's hiding his face with a baseball cap, and it seems he has things he wants to keep hidden too. Two wounded people, on a journey to a second life.>
